item.title: Reply to 'Detect chinese (multibyte) character in a string in a column in oracle database' on stackoverflow at https://stackoverflow.com/questions/1831114/detect-chinese-multibyte-character-in-a-string-in-a-column-in-oracle-database:
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
Reply to 'Detect chinese (multibyte) character in a string in a column in oracle database' on stackoverflow at https://stackoverflow.com/questions/1831114/detect-chinese-multibyte-character-in-a-string-in-a-column-in-oracle-database:

Try “where length(column) < lengthb(column)”
